description: Beacon Hill's client, an aerospace manufacturer, is currently seeking a Compliance Analyst to support their Hawthorne, CA office.
responsibilities: Adjudication of restricted party screening escalations for customer accountsConduct open-source research and adverse media checks for customer accountsReview and respond to customer escalations to clear matches on global sanctions listsSupport the Global Trade Compliance team in performing enhanced diligence reviews across company programsWork cross-functionally with company business teams to ensure compliance with sanctions screening programsAssist in enhancing the company's end-to-end sanctions compliance program

qualifications.required: +2 years of experience in sanctions compliance and risk managementFamiliarity with U.S. sanctions and export control regulationsExperience working with screening platforms (Dow Jones Risk and Compliance, World Check)Experience collaborating with team members of all levels, and cross-functional partnersStrong analytical skills and a proactive mindset
